channel.title: ReFlectionX V2 | Skilling | Highscores | Daily updates | Minigames
channel.description:
see if server is online, support by voting! [url=http://www.rune-server.org/toplist.php?do=vote&sid=7724&name=ReFlectionX317]http://www.rune-server.org/toplist.php?do=vote&sid=7724&name=ReFlectionX317[/url]
[URL=http://tinyurl.com/cysjyt5/][IMG]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_wPEYt539Qgo/THsjCb4836I/AAAAAAAACK0/3QVyBJA87cI/s320/PlayNowButton2.2.bmp[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://reflectionx.info/forums/index.php/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img515/1369/53458565.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://reflectionx.info/highscores/highscores.php][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img196/3783/highscoreicon.png[/img][/URL] Coding team: ~ Ashley [508s worker] ~ Grecoloco (scapedef) [317 PI specialist] ~ Goudont [Creative 562 artist]
Features: ~Daily updates ~Game frame changes (317, 474, 508.. etc) ~All skills ~Good experience rate ~Highscores ~Vote4Cash ~Lots of enjoyable minigames ~Helpful teleports
ReFlectionX is a RSPS server developed by Goudont, GrecoLoco and Ashley. ReFlectionX is a regular server which consists of Skilling and Wildy PvP. We aim to give enough content to keep our players busy and happy.
To answer questions about becoming staff on the server:
We do not promote anyone out of random. We look for people that are capable of handling tricky situations and are mature enough to handle any type of argument. If you ask to be a player moderator, you will be warned. Continue to ask and further punishment will be dealt. We tend to be very strict on our choice of staff as we wish to have our players treated equally and respectfully with no issue at all.
Saying all that, we will not be promoting anyone until the server is in need of staff to help our manager, Mike, maintain order of the server. Myself will not be on the server enough to help out, which is why player moderators will be needed in future. Please keep note that we are strict, as said above, of the choice we make upon the staff.
For more information consisting about the staff position, do so visit the forums.
To help out with the structure of the server and many more updates and uptime of the server, please help out by donating if you can. Donators can get many benefits over regular players, and our team has made sure that the player who donates will be satisfied with his or her choice.
Regular Donator benefits -Donatorzone -You can wear Chaotic items -You can wear Statius Items -Vesta ::yell Tag: [Reg Donator] playername:
Super Donator benefits Access to regular donator benefits - You can Use Overloads -Experience rates, (x2 for SUPER Donators ::yell Tag: [Super Donator] playername:
Elite Donator benefits Access to regular donator and super donator benefits -Access to a new mini game -Experience rates, (x3 for Elite Donators ::yell Tag: [Elite Donator] playername:
100% PVM [img]http://reflectionx.info/images/slide1.png[/img]
Cooking/Firemaking [img]http://i.imgur.com/50tgaDp.png[/img]
Woodcutting [img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/3945/lgte69.png[/img]
Mining [img]http://i.imgur.com/deXZIH9.png[/img]
Smithing [img]http://i.imgur.com/uMbSXUk.png[/img]
MINIGAMES:
DUELING! [img]http://i.imgur.com/bgyoOj6.png[/img] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/6994/lgte85.png[/img]
JAD [img]http://i.imgur.com/5wvBfXr.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

[quote=“TinyScape, post:10, topic:519494”][/quote]You’d be surprised how much effort we’ve actually put into this :L

word homie . and we’re STILL updating. The thing is, when 1 owner is offline, the other is online, so it’s almost like 24/7 coding due to different timezones.

Read full topic

item.title: ReFlectionX V2 | Skilling | Highscores | Daily updates | Minigames
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“goudont, post:3, topic:519494”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=637958.msg4300076#msg4300076 date=1368843858]
Having the ability to change gameframes is overrated.
[/quote]

Well, the players didn’t seem to like a classic 317, so we just did a PI that lets you change your game frame. Cause I personally think classical servers are better than regular PIs with the fancy shit on em, but some players do like the fancy shit, and some don’t. So we made the ability to change the gameframe.[/quote]
PI is a server, the gameframe changing is handled by the client. Anyway, good luck with it.

Read full topic
item.source: ReFlectionX V2 | Skilling | Highscores | Daily updates | Minigames

Having the ability to change gameframes is overrated.

Well, the players didn’t seem to like a classic 317, so we just did a PI that lets you change your game frame. Cause I personally think classical servers are better than regular PIs with the fancy shit on em, but some players do like the fancy shit, and some don’t. So we made the ability to change the gameframe.

item.description:
@goudont wrote:

see if server is online, support by voting!
http://www.rune-server.org/toplist.php?do=vote&sid=7724&name=ReFlectionX317


Coding team:
~ Ashley [508s worker]
~ Grecoloco (scapedef) [317 PI specialist]
~ Goudont [Creative 562 artist]

Features:
~Daily updates
~Game frame changes (317, 474, 508… etc)
~All skills
~Good experience rate
~Highscores
~Vote4Cash
~Lots of enjoyable minigames
~Helpful teleports

ReFlectionX is a RSPS server developed by Goudont, GrecoLoco and Ashley. ReFlectionX is a regular server which consists of Skilling and Wildy PvP. We aim to give enough content to keep our players busy and happy.

To answer questions about becoming staff on the server:

We do not promote anyone out of random. We look for people that are capable of handling tricky situations and are mature enough to handle any type of argument. If you ask to be a player moderator, you will be warned. Continue to ask and further punishment will be dealt. We tend to be very strict on our choice of staff as we wish to have our players treated equally and respectfully with no issue at all.

Saying all that, we will not be promoting anyone until the server is in need of staff to help our manager, Mike, maintain order of the server. Myself will not be on the server enough to help out, which is why player moderators will be needed in future. Please keep note that we are strict, as said above, of the choice we make upon the staff.

For more information consisting about the staff position, do so visit the forums.

To help out with the structure of the server and many more updates and uptime of the server, please help out by donating if you can. Donators can get many benefits over regular players, and our team has made sure that the player who donates will be satisfied with his or her choice.

Regular Donator benefits
-Donatorzone
-You can wear Chaotic items
-You can wear Statius Items
-Vesta
::yell Tag: [Reg Donator] playername:

Super Donator benefits
Access to regular donator benefits

  • You can Use Overloads
    -Experience rates, (x2 for SUPER Donators
    ::yell Tag: [Super Donator] playername:

Elite Donator benefits
Access to regular donator and super donator benefits
-Access to a new mini game
-Experience rates, (x3 for Elite Donators
::yell Tag: [Elite Donator] playername:

100% PVM

Cooking/Firemaking

Woodcutting

Mining

Smithing

MINIGAMES:

DUELING!

JAD

Read full topic
